About Me

Let me tell you a few things...

BIO

Responsible and goal-oriented Web Developer. Bilingual, strong interpersonal and organizational skills, with extensive experience in Microsoft Office.

Easy Plastic Containers corporate

Office Assistant

Oversaw the entire supply chain, from ordering and warehousing to shipping the final products to the customers. Processed requests, managed inventory, issued invoices and maintained database.

Just Thrift

Sales Associate

Assisted customers throughout the buying process, such as greeting customers when they enter the store, helping customers find specific products or showing them how to use them and ringing up customer purchases on the POS register.

Gardan Engenharia

Environmental engineer

Helped maintain clean and healthy surroundings through the protection of air, soil, and water quality.Designed safe solid waste transfer and disposal sites, water distribution and treatment systems, and wastewater collection and treatment systems.
